about_me.des: I am a full stack Rails developer, located in Fort Wayne, Indiana.

career.ocp_des: Senior Software Engineer at One Click Politics. Modernized an archaic Monolith application into modernized Rails Microservices utilizing Docker images on AWS.
career.cmps_des: Senior Software Engineer, Maintained a Rails Monolith. Introduced Continous Integration and automated testing.
career.nextcode_des: Full Stack Rails Developer, and Scrum Master at Enspire software. Created multiple different software solutions, for customers. Technologies used: Ruby on Rails, node.js, Rails CMS, IOS, Andriod, Javascript, Bootstrap, RubyMotion, Magento, Minitest, Cucumber, Jenkins CI.
career.nextcode_job: Full Stack Rails Developer, Scrum Master
career.netease_des: Full Stack Rails Engineer. Maintained a large codebase, Devops experience in Chef, and Docker. As well as acting as a liason between Squaremouth and it's Carriers.
career.college_des: At July 2014,I graduated from Indiana Tech Fort Wayne.
career.college_job: Student - Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
